title: Museum explains scientific progress
creator_credit: Museum of Applied Science and State Film Centre of Victoria
brief_description: Shows the displays and models of the Melbourne Museum of Applied Science. Stresses the craftsmanship which is applied to the explanatory models, such as those shown - the artificial moons and the rockets now probing into space.
